query: select DATE(`createdAt`) as `sale_date`, COALESCE(SUM(`totalAmount`), 0), COUNT(*) from `sales` where (`sales`.`userId` = 1 and `sales`.`createdAt` >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) group by `sale_date` order by `sale_date`;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user xPPqfHznEAfm8UX.root --database 2bLXbDKTKg2mm4NSzmRxMc --execute select DATE(`createdAt`) as `sale_date`, COALESCE(SUM(`totalAmount`), 0), COUNT(*) from `sales` where (`sales`.`userId` = 1 and `sales`.`createdAt` >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) group by `sale_date` order by `sale_date`;
